      • CheckAppointmentConflict

        private boolean CheckAppointmentConflict​(java.lang.String column,
                                         int value)
        Checks for an existing appointment conflict.
        Parameters:
        column - the name of the column to check for a conflict in, e.g. Contact_ID for a contact conflict.
        value - the ID of the customer/contact to find a possible conflict for.
        Returns:
        TRUE if a conflict exists.

      • CheckContactAppointmentConflict

        private boolean CheckContactAppointmentConflict()
        Checks for an appointment scheduling conflict for the selected contact.
        Returns:
        TRUE if a conflict exists.

      • CheckCustomerAppointmentConflict

        private boolean CheckCustomerAppointmentConflict()
        Checks for an appointment scheduling conflict for the selected customer.
        Returns:
        TRUE if a conflict exists.

      • ValidateAppointment

        boolean ValidateAppointment()
        Checks to see if all input appointment details result in a valid appointment and prints an error message if they do not.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the appointment is valid.
